detectors.sub2.logging_utils.LoggingSetup¶

class detectors.sub2.logging_utils.LoggingSetup(tmp_log_path, log_level)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class that provides utilities for setting up logging.

Parameters:

  • tmp_log_path (str) – The temporary path for the log file.

  • log_level (int) – The log level to be set.

tmp_log_path¶

The temporary path for the log file.

Type:

str

log_level¶

The log level to be set.

Type:

int

log_path¶

The final path for the log file.

Type:

str

tmp_logging()[source]¶

A context manager that sets up logging and yields control.

set_path()[source]¶

Sets the final path for the log file.

set_level()[source]¶

Sets the log level.

Sets the log level.

A context manager that sets up logging and yields control.
set_level()[source]¶

Sets the log level.

Raises:

AssertionError – If the number of logging handlers is not equal to 1.

Sets the final path for the log file.

Raises:

A context manager that sets up logging and yields control.
